thread.title_full: FIDE President visited the exhibition in Abu Dhabi (World Chess Federation) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: FIDE President visited the exhibition in Abu Dhabi (World Chess Federation)
text: ( Source : World Chess Federation ) On October 6th an exhibition ' Art Russe Collection of 20th Century Russian and Soviet Art : War and Peace ' was opened in the capital of UAE in one of the most prestigious and luxurious hotel of the country
